name: MyLittleBathtub
description:
This game was developed as part of the "One Game per Week" seminar at the University of Europe for Applied Sciences in Hamburg.  With a new topic  every week, Game Design Students develop a prototype-like game to improve their GameDev skills by coming up with quick solutions with minimal resources.

The given topic for this project : "Toys & Playfulness".

My little Bathtube is a sandbox-like game in which you are free to create your own childlike bathtube experience.

Game Description  

Key Features

-Pop bubbles, change the color of your bathwater and listen to different songs

-Drop some toys into your tub and watch them interacting with each other!

-Use your Bathbomb to reset your tub and create a new setting!
